      • logsTransformation

        public java.lang.String logsTransformation(java.lang.String csar,
                                           java.lang.String plat,
                                           int start)
        Calls the REST API and returns logs for the specified Transformation
        Parameters:
        csar - CSAR for which a transformation is available
        plat - Platform for which a transformation is available
        start - where to start with log output, default is start position 0
        Returns:
        output for the CLI

      • inputList

        public java.lang.String inputList(java.lang.String csar,
                                  java.lang.String plat)
        Calls the REST API and shows every needed Input, that must be set before a transformation can be started
        Parameters:
        csar - CSAR for which required inputs should be shown
        plat - Platform for which required inputs should be shown
        Returns:
        output for the CLI

      • placeInput

        public java.lang.String placeInput(java.lang.String csar,
                                   java.lang.String plat,
                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> inputs)
        Calls the REST API, and trys to set the required Inputs. After they are set successfully a transformation can be started
        Parameters:
        csar - CSAR for which to set Inputs
        plat - Platform for which to set Inputs
        inputs - the required inputs, format is key=value, = is not allowed as an identifier
        Returns:
        output for the CLI

        public java.lang.String listPlatform()
        Calls the REST API and returns all Platforms, that are available for a transformation

        output for the CLI

        Returns:
        output for the CLI
